Class CoordinatorComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI

    public class CoordinatorComponent
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
    The class CoordinatorComponent defines a generic simulation coordinator component.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

      protected static int NUMBER_OF_SCHEDULABLE_THREADS
      no need for statically defined schedulable threads.
      protected static int NUMBER_OF_STANDARD_THREADS
      one thread to take charge of the simulation main coordination, and one to process the calls to the submodels when they need to perform external transitions and notify their parent models.
